Module com.vadris.gui
Package com.vadris.math

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
com.vadris.math.Graph
public class Graph extends Object
Represents a graph using a list of coordinates
Author:
Vadris

    • findIntersection

      public static Coordinate findIntersection(Graph graphA, Graph graphB) throws Exception
      Finds the coordinate where two graphs intersect. the points are connected with straight lines
      Parameters:
      graphA - the first graph
      graphB - the second graph
      Returns:
      the coordinate at which the graphs intersect
      Throws:
      Exception - if the graphs don't intersect
